input.sentences: sitting down talking ready to start the night
beginning to bbq and cook everything
sitting at the fire until its time to go to sleep
output.sentences: We're getting set up at the camp site.
Chatting and deciding what we want to do.
Dad is firing up the grill, and cooking our feast!
The girls are getting some refreshing beverages.
After a fun day, we sit around the fire telling ghost stories.
